General.Name: Jindo.Co. Ltd
General.Description: Jindo.Co., Ltd. manufactures, distributes, and sells fashion products in South Korea. It offers fur products under the Jindo Fur, Elfee, Uba, and Cleve brands. The company was formerly known as Jindo F & Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Jindo.Co., Ltd. in 2010. Jindo.Co., Ltd. was founded in 1973 and is headquartered in Seoul, South Korea.

1.Name: Yong-Yeon  Kim
1.Title: Head of Marketing Division and Director

3.Name: Jong-Yoo  Hwang
3.Title: Head of Supporting Division and Director
